item.title: Worst violence in Syria since Assad fall as dozens killed in clashes
item.description: A group that has been monitoring the civil war said 71 people died in clashes between the two sides.

item.title: Donald Tusk announces military training plan for all Polish men
item.description: Poland's prime minister said his government plans to have a model ready by the end of the year.

item.title: Paris trains halted and area evacuated after WW2 bomb found
item.description: The unexploded bomb was found on tracks near the station, with all Paris trains, plus Eurostar to Brussels, suspended.

item.title: Olympian wanted by FBI on drug ring charges
item.description: Former Canadian snowboarder Ryan Wedding has been placed on the FBI's 10 most wanted fugitives list.

item.title: Fears of destruction as 'erratic' cyclone nears Australia
item.description: Four million people across Queensland and northern New South Wales are in the firing line.
